elements.name: situation1Text
elements.html: People think and do many different things when they feel sad, blue, or depressed. Below is a list of possibilities, answer if you never, sometimes, often, or always think or do each one when you feel down, sad, or depressed. Please indicate what you generally do, not what you think you should do.

elements.name: brooding1
elements.title: Think 'What am I doing to deserve this?'

elements.name: brooding2
elements.title: Think 'Why do I always react this way?'

elements.name: brooding3
elements.title: Think about a recent situation, wishing it had gone better.

elements.name: brooding4
elements.title: Think 'Why do I have problems other people donâ€™t have?'

elements.name: brooding5
elements.title: Think about how angry you are with yourself.

elements.name: reflection6
elements.title: Analyze recent events to try to understand why you are depressed.

elements.name: reflection7
elements.title: Go away by yourself and think about why you feel this way.

elements.name: reflection8
elements.title: Write down what you are thinking and analyze it.

elements.name: reflection9
elements.title: Think about how you don't feel up to doing anything.

elements.name: reflection10
elements.title: Analyze your personality to try to understand why you are depressed.
